author: carlblue
title: A surprisingly good set.
review: I found this set on sale and picked it up recently and built it and I must say it's a good looking set.  I like spaceship sets that come with either a stand or control tower like the Star Wars B-Wing 6208 set.  This set has a small takeoff pad and control tower which makes it a great display piece.  It's very swooshible and the ship is sturdy.  I accidentally knocked the ship off a shelf and it stayed intact!  Not many Lego sets do that.  The build is pretty simple and the ship looks very sleek and there's storage space inside the ship if needed.  The figs are good especially Winston.  Nice to see Lego used good pieces for the control tower and I can see them being used for a control tower MOC for say the Saturn V one day.  RRP is pretty high and that did put me off buying it but they seem to be on sale now at a few stores as the theme has been discontinued.  At Target stores in Australia it's on clearance (if you can find them) and they're under $100.
